title: Stanisław Świerk
text:
Stanisław Świerk (born 19 June 1935 in <a href="Jurk%C3%B3w%2C%20Limanowa%20County">Jurków</a> – died 16 January 2004 in <a href="Wroc%C5%82aw">Wrocław</a>) is a Polish <a href="association%20football">football</a> player and coach.
Career.
Playing career.
He played for <a href="Czarnych%20Szczecin">Czarnych Szczecin</a>, <a href="Lotnik%20Warszawa">Lotnik Warszawa</a>, <a href="Stal%20Rzesz%C3%B3w%20%28football%29">Stal Rzeszow</a>, <a href="Unia%20O%C5%9Bwi%C4%99cim">Unia Oświęcim</a> and <a href="Motor%20Lublin">Motor Lublin</a>.
Coaching career.
He managed <a href="Motor%20Lublin">Motor Lublin</a>, <a href="Moto%20Jelcz%20O%C5%82awa">Moto Jelcz Oława</a>, <a href="Odra%20Wroc%C5%82aw">Odra Wrocław</a>, <a href="G%C3%B3rnik%20Wa%C5%82brzych">Górnik Wałbrzych</a>, <a href="GKS%20Tychy">GKS Tychy</a>, <a href="Widzew%20%C5%81%C3%B3d%C5%BA">Widzew Łódź</a>, <a href="Zaglebie%20Lubin">Zaglebie Lubin</a>, <a href="Odra%20Opole">Odra Opole</a>, <a href="%C5%9Al%C4%99za%20Wroc%C5%82aw">Ślęza Wrocław</a> and <a href="%C5%9Al%C4%85sk%20Wroc%C5%82aw">Śląsk Wrocław</a>.
